r.d: Memprof is a fast and accurate memory profiler that can be used to find the cause of memory leaks in PHP applications.
r.n: ## Improvements - Use filename for script and binary instead of /todo.php (@samlitowitz, #92) - Allow output_format to be defined from ini setting (@gaelreyrol, #97) - Add units to Callgrind label for memory size and update `BlockCount` to `Call_Count` (@samlitowitz, #95) - Add support for PIE
